https://tmrev.io/movie/423376-Die Markus Family 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null This film tells the story of Markus Anatol Weisse, who, astonishingly enough, became an artist, in spite of being only very partially sighted. Markus also builds strange machine-like beings and wishes that he himself were a biological robot, or cyborg. Die Markus Family
